lines: 1. Alas, and did my Saviour bleed? And did my Sovereign die? Would He devote that sacred head For someone such as I?
Refrain : At the cross at the cross where I first saw the light, And the burden of my heart rolled away, It was there by faith I received my sight, And now I am happy all the day!
2. Was it for crimes that I have done, He suffered on the tree? Amazing pity! grace unknown! And love beyond degree!
3. But drops of grief can ne'er repay The debt of love I owe: Here, Lord, I give myself away, 'Tis all that I can do!
